articles.title: Aged care could be beneficial for people with dementia: Australian report - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Australians living with dementia who move into residential aged care after a hospital stay are less likely to be readmitted to hospital within one year than those who return to living in the community, according to a new report from the Australian Institute o…
